title: Republican gubernatorial candidate Ed Hale calls for return to fossil fuels to combat rising energy costs
description: Republican Ed Hale wants Maryland to re-open closed power plants and build new fossil fuel facilities to combat rising energy costs.

title: Artifacts from ancient Karkamış on display in Ankara
description: Newly revealed artifacts from ancient Karkamış, recovered through Turkish-Italian excavations ongoing since 2011, are on view at the Museum of Anatolian Civilizations until March 26

title: Researchers Unveil Ancient Conqueror’s Forgotten City In War-Torn Desert
description: Archaeologists in Southern Iraq have identified the site of ancient Alexandria, a large port city founded by Alexander the Great, located near the Tigris River.

title: Researchers Unveil Ancient Conqueror’s Forgotten City In War-Torn Desert
description: discovered the site of ancient Alexandria

title: Medieval Monks Wrote Over a Copy of an Ancient Star Catalog. Now, a Particle Accelerator is Revealing the Long-Lost Original Text
description: The parchments initially contained references to a star catalog and maps created during the second century B.C.E.
